mapper.select: select count(sno) totSize from board where subject like '%${findStr}%'

select b.sno, b.boardtype, b.subject, m.nickname, date_format(b.nal, '%Y-%m-%d') nal, b.viewcount from board b join member m on m.id = b.id WHERE b.id=#{findStr} OR b.subject LIKE '%${findStr}%' order by b.sno desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}
